**Custom Extreme Ultraviolet (XUV) Spectrometer Request for Proposal**
===========================================================

**Reference Number**: cb-8355-7911386
** Amendment Number**: 1
**Solicitation Number**: 23-58084
**Publication Date**: August 23, 2023
**Closing Date**: September 17, 2023, 14:00:00 (MST)

**Procurement Details**
------------------------

*   This RFP is open to suppliers based in Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region).
*   The contract will be delivered in Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region).
*   The SDT Research Center at the National Research Council Canada requires a custom Extreme Ultraviolet (XUV) Spectrometer with an XUV CCD camera in an integrated package.
*   The scope of work includes the design, development, and delivery of the spectrometer.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

*   This solicitation is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
*   It is also subject to the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.
*   In addition, it is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).
